rules_text:
When Arboreal Artisanry enters the battlefield, draw a card, then draw an additional card for each permanent you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{5}{G}{G}: Put seven +1/+1 counters on target noncreature land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.
